fifth.text: Multi-user collaboration features allow team members to easily share and work on assets together

sixth.text: Optimized AI models ensure quick generation of high-quality assets

painpoints.title: Solving User Pain Points
painpoints.subtitle: How AetherForge addresses common challenges faced by designers and developers

first.description: Designers spend a significant amount of time creating assets manually in various styles, reducing productivity.
first.solutionText: One-click asset generation reduces creation time from hours to minutes, boosting productivity.

second.description: Converting existing designs to new styles often requires redesigning, wasting time and resources.
second.solutionText: Intelligent style transfer easily converts existing designs to different styles without redesigning.

third.description: Designers and developers use different tools, leading to incompatible asset formats and workflow disruptions.
third.solutionText: Multi-format support and conversion ensures seamless workflows between designers and developers.

fourth.description: As projects grow, assets proliferate, making management and retrieval difficult and time-consuming.
fourth.solutionText: Centralized asset library with powerful search, categorization, and version control simplifies asset management.

cta.title: Ready to Boost Your Design Efficiency?
cta.text: Start using AetherForge today and experience the magic of one-click asset generation

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Learn more about AetherForge and get answers to common questions

questions.q2: Do I need design experience to use AetherForge?
questions.q3: Can I use AetherForge-generated assets commercially?
questions.q4: What formats can I export from AetherForge?
questions.q5: How does AetherForge integrate with Figma?

answers.a1: AetherForge uses advanced AI technology to analyze your input (design prototype, HTML, SVG, Figma, or text description), then generates high-quality assets based on your chosen style and settings. The entire process is fully automated and requires just a few clicks to complete.
answers.a2: No! AetherForge is designed to be intuitive and can be used even by those without design experience. You can start with a text description or upload existing designs, and the system will guide you through the process.
answers.a3: Yes! Pro and Enterprise subscriptions allow commercial use of generated assets without restrictions. Assets generated with the Free plan are for personal use only. See our Terms of Use for detailed information.
answers.a4: AetherForge supports multiple export formats including PNG, JPEG, SVG, PDF, HTML, and CSS. You can choose the most suitable format for your needs.
answers.a5: AetherForge offers Figma plugins and URL integration. You can generate assets directly from your Figma designs or input a Figma URL and select specific Frames or Components to process on our platform.

footer.description: Intelligent asset generation platform helping designers and developers boost efficiency
